summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." It instructs users to respect robots.txt rules and acknowledges rate limiting based on IP address. The bill directs users to utilize the Government Publishing Office (GPO) Bulk Data Download service (https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/) as an alternative method for accessing information. The core intent is to regulate web scraping activities and provide alternative means to access data.
